name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed - Jedi Temple Mission Pack
storyline: Darth Vader’s Secret Apprentice turns to the Jedi Temple to learn more about his father, and while searching through the rubble of the destroyed building he must confront his inner demons...
summary:
The Apprentice Mission Pack contains an entirely new single-player mission set in the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant. In this mission Darth Vader’s Secret Apprentice turns to the Jedi Temple to learn more about his father, and while searching through the rubble of the destroyed building he must confront his inner demons...

Download this mission pack and you’ll also get 6 brand new characters and 3 all new Secret Apprentice costumes.

This pack is included in the Ultimate Sith Edition.
